content.detailedDescription: A family member woke up somewhere between 11pm and midnight, she doesn't remember the exact time. she claimed to hear loud planes flying back and forth in the sky and didn't know what was happening. because when planes come into chicago they turn around over the lake, at first she thought it was that. but this was different. they were loud, right outside, and flying back and forth. i was sleeping in the other room and heard them as well (though i assumed they were helicopters), but brushed it off and went back to sleep. i just assumed it was military craft or something of that nature. anyway, she said that she got up to look out the window and, when she did, the noise from the planes stopped and all she saw was this bright light that looked like it could be another moon; it was hovering over  lake michigan. there were light rays pulsating from it - white and yellow. she could not make out the shape of the object because the light was so bright but she thought it might be circular. she said it was just hovering there and then shone right in her face. at this point she claims to have become very frightened and, for some reason, went back to sleep. she then forgot about this entire event until tonight when she said the memory just came back to her. weird! i thought maybe it could have been some kind of military project, but who knows.
content.summary: Flying object, pulsating lights, hovering in sky

content.detailedDescription: At 2245pm i was in my backyard(chasing away a skunk) when a bright emerald green light caught my attention. it stood out against the sky and the street lights. i initially thought it was a plane, but then noticed the light disappear and then reappear 2-3 times.This light switched between green and bright white,which peaked my suspicion. so i moved to the front of the house, and aligned the light to the peak of a neighbors house. this reassured i could verify the movement of the light more precisely. i watched this light for approx. 10 min. moving quickly around the sky in a southern direction,closer toward the monterey bay area. as i was observing this green light, a brilliant saphire-purple colored light appeared to the west(right) of the green light. it moved in all directions,altitudes. as like the first, the light would disappear, then reappear except not changing colors. i watched this for a few more minutes, when it dropped in altitude and headed toward the green light,then disappeared. there was no movement for maybe 5 minutes, when i noticed the saphire-purple light reappear in a more westerly direction. i followed it as it dropped in altitude(following it over another neighbors roofline)then headed in a westerly direction over the bay and out of eyesight. this lasted from 1045pm to 1105pm.I just wished i had another person to experience this with...Not a skunk. keep looking up!
content.summary: Moving lights over monterey area...

content.detailedDescription:
Well i was at my house and my dauther was waching tv ... and i decided to check the sky for any anomalies or ufo or things like that and there it was...I always check have my ir filter on to check for spheres or things like that   and thats how i found it  i kew it wanst an airplane cuz it was little like ligths on the top and it was kinda still in the sky... plus an airplane is much much larger than that thing.. at first i was like man dis could be a real ufo.  but i kep my clam cuz sometime   i get dissapointed

i lost sight of the ufo because my camera focus suckx
content.summary: It looked so weird.

content.detailedDescription:
We were on a trip down the oregon coast and stopped at the yaquina head lighthouse near newport, or. it was a beautiful day, and i was trying out my new lumix zs3 high quality digital camera, taking numerous photos, as it was a beautiful, sunny day.

i noticed nothing unusual that day, but when i reviewed all the photos at home, one included what appears to be a sizable disc-shaped object in the sky (visible at about 1 o'clock position in top of photo). zooming in, i can see it's not a bird, and sun is glinting off the surface. even further away down the right side of the photo, there appear to be two more off in the distance toward the other shore.

this photo was taken facing north, just east of the lighthouse. i took other photos at the same location, and none of them show these spots in the sky.
content.summary: Disc in sky off oregon coast, was not visible until reviewing photos at home.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were sitting up in the hollywood hills, fooling around,we took a break and were just looking out into the night,talking...We heard a sound, like cracking, looked around us, a practically in front of us, up bove us, not very far but so plain and clear, the edges, everything so clearly stood out, this ball, we slowly, crackling by us, little,flames coming out all around this ball, the view we had of it did not last long.  we did not know what to think, we did not think it was a flying saucer, so it was not a ufo.  the view of the sky of where we were was not very extensive, alot of plants and such, around.
content.summary: Solid shape"sparkler"gold,round,moving very slowly,making crackling sounds

content.detailedDescription: At around 1:30 am i was getting ready to go back in the house when i saw a bank of round lights moving quickley. their were vertical lines of light along the side of it. at the front of the vertical lines was one green line.All the lights appeared to be a pale red color i activated my cell phone camera and quickly took one photo before it was behind the trees by my house.It was when i printed the photo on my computer and blew up the picture that you can see the round bank of lights illuminating a triangle shaped object that the lights seem to be underneath. i am sending a copy of this photo. this object appeared very quickly in the sky while i was feeding my cats. i have never seen anything like this in the sky before.
content.summary: Round bank of lights under a triangle shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up early to and went to the kitchen sink to get a drink of water and saw the super bright light that at first i thought was the moon. the object lowered to almost ground level then illuminated the area in the woods all around it. we live in a home that is built on the side of a hill and the light was right on top of the hill where we live. after a few minutes i noticed that a beam of light was shining towards the north west and it stayed in that area for approx 3 min. the object then suddently shined a beam of light to the southeast area. the other area that had been illuminated in the opposite direction was then dark. the "moon" doesn't shine light in different directions. i woke up my husband and by the time i got back to the laundry room door window to show him what i was witnessing the light had dimmed. it was almost like they were watching me and knew i had gone to get another witness or something. he went back to bed half asleep.... and then is when it started shining a bright light in the two different direcitons (at different times). i woke him up again and he came and looked at it but was so sleepy he just said oh..It's the moon. i pointed out to him that we could only see one side of the tree's that was all lit up and he just said he was going to bed. i watched the light until it disappeared. it appeared to fade then just disappear. the woods are heavy behind our house up on top of the hill and when this object was illuminating the area all the tree's you could see very good. it was scary..I kept going from one window to another window to get a better look at it and trying to get my camera to work.

hopefully you have had someone else in oklahoma that saw this object. whatever it was it was huge. there was no noise at all. it was a bright white light but big and you couldn't see any outline. i was looking at it through a lot of tree's so it was just a large large light.
the funny thing about it and the timing i thought might have something to do with the fact that i had started burning some brush piles next to our driveway that is right on the south of where this object was seen the day before. the fire had caught an old oilfield rubber hose that was very long on fire and it had burned very slowly all night. i wondered if this from the air could have sparked the objects attention. the next morning when i went up to look at the area where i'd seen the object i could tell that the rubber hose had continued to burn all night very slowly. the spot where the object was seen is a large open area where we had bulldozier work done the day before to clean up an old oil well site. there was fresh dirt and bulldozier tracks and trac hoe tracks and i only saw one little area that looked funny. it was a half circle with ridges prescisly spaced. i don't know but the track hoe could have made this impression in the dirt. i did take a few pictures of the dirt. during the sighting that early morning when i tried to take pictures my camera's battery was dead. by the time i got it half way charged i only got a few pictures and none showed the bright light, only one picture showed anything unusual and it shows 2 red lights in the upper right hand corner.

this was my experience and what i saw.
content.summary: Bright light looked "moon like". moved from above treeline & dropped to near the ground. illuminated whole area beneath then shined beam of light to the northwest then to the east.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to have a smoke and as soon as i sat down a large red fireball.It disappeared over the vitosha
content.summary: Bright red light. watched it disappear. this was no star.

content.detailedDescription: We were in our backyard in south san jose (branham and meridian area) around our fire pit when i noticed a red light flying westerly of our home at about 45 deg. traveling from west to east then changing directions southerly. it was silent red-ish like mars with no blinking navigational lights. i pointed it out to my family...We then noticed it was dropping small balls of light from it's underside that fell and vanished...It began to pulse in intensity higher and lower while heading south..Then it dimmed a few times before just going out....
content.summary: South san jose june 5, 2010 at 11:02 p.M.

content.detailedDescription: 3 fast flashing objects moving west to east in and out of the clouds above portland international airport, columbia rive and troutdel airport last seen flying north,north east . object 1.  flashing what looked like to be bright white fast flashing light (lights are strobe like) flying fast no sound. object 2. flashing what looked like to be bright white fast flashing light (lights are strobe like) flying fast no sound. object 3. flashing what looked like to be bright red fast flashing light (lights are strobe like) flying fast no sound. all 3 objects appeared in same order as the description 1,2, and 3.... i just had a thought to look up and i did. out- side my home talking on the phone. of the way lights looked i thought maybe they where helicopters, however moving way to fast to be helicopters. it felt like i was suppose to see them. kept flying north, north east
content.summary: 3 fast flashing objects moving west to east in and out of the clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out front of my house having a cigarette. the shooting star caught my eye, i stood up real fast to try to get a view. a few seconds (aprox. 2 secs) in the exact location of what i thought was a shooting star poped back on to a white light that was aprox. twice the size of a avg star and four times brighter. the first thought that came to my mind of how it was moving was like a fire fly. the object looked the same distance as the stars because it was so far away. the object made a complete circle patter on the sky which let me know it could not be a shooting star and then did a sharp turn and disappeared. a couple days earlier during the day time i saw a plane doing some real sharp turns with no noise, i dismissed it thinking it was just a stunt plane but the place it appeared was the same as the object i saw at night. i always thought i would be scared out of my mind if i saw a ufo but surprisingly i was excited and wish the it stuck around longer to watch. being paranoid i checked the time to see if i lost any, thankfully i did not.
content.summary: Double size of avg star and 4 times brighter then avg star

content.detailedDescription:
I am so apprehensive to tell you what happened before we saw the ufo .... needles to say it was a christian experience with high energies.... myself and my sister and cousin all 3 went outside to cool off and take a breath when i mentioned we should look to the sky for any "signs" in just a moment an odd looking light to the south caught my eye... after looking at it for just a few seconds i could tell it was not stable.... it was moving left then right so subtly.. i pointed it out to the two with me and they began to track its odd movements.... it would get brighter... move left and right up and down and a few occasions appeared to move circularly... we noticed it together and all verbally recognized it and so my sister inquired if it recognized us.... at that time the object appeared to move closer enough to see there was not just one light but what appeared to be 3 lights possible 4 that were white and one in the corner that was red....We could almost make out a shape of the arrangements of lights to be almost pod-like sections containing a light per section.... 

once we had tracked it and gazed in amazement what we were seeing i ran into get my video camera (which of course had no tape in it) and my sister grabbed her small camera and started taping.... it almost seemed that once we got the camera other lights began to appear around the sky with similar movements and right at this time the clouds were increasing very rapidly... the object we originally tracked appears to dissipate into a cloud .... reappearing under the clouds and then behind them... i ran inside again to get my daughter and wife to see if they wanted to see a real life ufo and they came out.... my wife viewed it for about 2 minutes but i dont think my daughter saw much she's 5. they hung out for a few minutes and had to go back inside so i walked them back.....As i  returned back outside i could not see my cousin and sister, they seemed to be in darkness, then out of darkness they ran toward me freaking out saying that a beam of light came toward them , my cousin claims he had an image or message delivered to his brain... i know far out im not sure i can believe that one myself but thats what he claims and after what i saw i wasnt about to argue.They also said they had seen a flash of lightning with no thunder.... i myself had heard strange thunder sounds throughout the clouding event....

we three stayed outside while it was clouding to see either the one object appearing in multiple places in the sky in and out of clouds or multiple objects doing the same... at one time i know i saw at least 3 different lights with the same characteristics of the first object we tracked...

my two witnesses were getting fairly excited about the whole ordeal so i constantly reminded them to stay spiritually focused on christ and not get overly excited... mainly because i have had one very close encounter (a few hundred feet) from an unidentified light dance followed by 5 miles of following me in the late 90's.... just a few weeks ago i saw a ufo and reported it to you guys in the same area.....
i dont know what else to say except for almost 50 minutes to an hour we watched lights all around our sky moving in and out of visibility.... disappearing in clear sky ... reappear in cloud sky it was crazy...
content.summary: 3 eyewitnesses teased by multiple objects

content.detailedDescription:
1: i was standing with a few friends sitting on a bench in a local park, smoking cigarettes and talking, and just doing what friends do.

2: one of my friends told me to look up to the sky, and she pointed out the first object. the next time, i spotted it my self, the third time she pointed it out to me. the fourth time, i just saw a quick, shooting star like object moving very fast, before vanishing. the fifth i spotted my self.

3: the first object, i thaught was a satelite, as it was moving across the sky, getting shinyer and brigther as it moved on, and then faded out. it was going at same speed during the time i saw it, slow, but not too slow, it could look like it was in orbit.

the second object i believed was nothing but a shooting star.

the fifth, i dont really know what it was, i have never seen anything like it before, and i am 100% it was not a plane, as the lights was not flashing as fast as they do on a plane, and it changed directions in such a way no man made airplane / space craft can.

4: the three first object was like a star getting brighter and brighter before fading out. it moved from south east to north west. it probably went very fast, as it was far away. it took perhaps 1 minute before it had crossed the sky.

the fourth object / shooting star was just a bright light going very fast, and was gone at the blink of an eye. 

the fifth object was just lights flashing every 8-10 secounds. it did not move in a straight line, but shifted from place to place every time it made a flash. the flash was bright, white/yellowish. and when it did not blink, and if you watched caarefully, i could see a shadowlike square moving around, in different directions.

5: me and my friends was not sure what to believe, the first 3 object, my friend got very excited, i was not quite so excited at the first objects, as i thaught it were simply satelites.
when the "shooting star" came, i felt a bit nervous about the whole thing. but i did believe it still was a simple shooting star.
the fifth one made me a little scared, but glad to have seen something like it.

6: the first 3 objects faded out, the shooting star was gone in the blink of and eye. and the flashing object just vanished at one point..
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Flash,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: 5 different seightsings in a couple of hours.

content.detailedDescription:
at approximately 10pm i was sitting on the back porch talking to my friend. a bright orange flash appeared behind him and i alerted him. the light itself had a strange fiery glow to it that haloed the sky around it. the whole time the light was steady but pulsed slowly brighter, then dimmer. the object hovered for a moment, then proceeded to rise. it made very erratic maneuvers, and at one point stopped in mid air for a few seconds made a sharp right then a tight left at a speed i have never seen a plane make before (i don't live too far from avoca airport and have seen planes my whole life). after a few more zig zag motions, it took a curved path left, giving up on the sky bound path it was on. at this point i was able to get a fairly good look at it. it was defiantly circular (but the light halo gave it a slightly elongated shape), with 1 row of lights (4 or 5)that stayed a steady orange and 1 light that kept flaring up. it then flew behind a cloud and never came back out. this lasted approximately 2 and a half, 3 minutes. 

     less then 5 minutes later another appeared rising very slowly off the horizon off the left, moved towards the direction of the first one (my right), stopping several times along the route. it the took the same course as the first but started to (dim?) out. the section of sky it was in was clear and you could easily see the stars in the sky. by the time it got to the same clouded area it looked like a star, but also had a slight lazy zig zag pattern like the first. it dimmed out completely before it reached the cloud.

     i have never seen anything like that before in my life. besides myself and my friend, his girlfriend, his niece, and his mom all saw it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Unknown
content.summary: 2 flying fireballs in the sky over scranton, pennsylvania

content.detailedDescription: Report by credible anonymous person stating that three pulsating lights observed their position overnight.
content.summary: Anomolous lights

content.detailedDescription:
As me an two of my friends were going home at aprox. 23:35, i looked up at the sky and saw at a height of about 500m and at a distance of about 200m east a huge fireball flying from east to west at about 300km/h. after 5-10 seconds the fireball stoped sudenly and i found it as an oportunity to take a picture but by the time i got my cell phone out of my pocket, it started accelerating and vanished in about 1-2 seconds following the same trajectory.

i didn't see the acceleration myself because i was focused on taking a picture, but the guys i were with told me and they said that it got up to the speed of sound or past because we all heard a sonic boom.
content.summary: Wierd and huge fireball near sibiu outskirts.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in chicago, il at irving park @ california walking to my car when my friend and i looked up to see two lights shaped like a cross section of an eye moving in smooth linear directions with a 6 degree course correction made out of the first one done in a precise angle. then they went into a straight line into the clouds about 15 miles east until the lights faded, most likely increasing altitude for this effect.

it seemed to be not an aircraft, i live by two large airports and can distinguish them readily.  the light effect was unlike any lens that i have seen on various aircraft.  it wasn't being diffused through water vapor either.  i was excited because this was *very* abnormal for the sky in the area.  usually the planes are flying at sub 2,000 ft altitude as they preform their landing sequence or are beginning to gain altitude for their normal journey.
content.summary: Glowing orb flying across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I have had many sightins in the barre vt. area 3 with in the last year somethin is goin on i also have a pic on my cell phone of one.
content.summary: Moved very fast and all over. was not a plane.

content.detailedDescription: Well i was eating pizza with a friend up on there roof top,after i got down eating i had my cell phone in one hand and i had said to my friend waving my phone up to the sky hey maybe i'll get some response to a ufo not thinking anything i laughed, so my and my friend where star watching then we started making out, then out of no where i see this bright light oval shaped object came out of nowhere, like it was watching us or something it hovered in the sky it was pretty large i was very surprised i stood up with my friend putting my hand over my face cover my eyes from this bright lighted ufo object which glowed yellowish light which i've never seen anything like it befor in my life, it hoovered by us for about a minute then it did a 360 turn and was gone less than 10 second'. i will never forget what i saw i know it was a ufo.
content.summary: It's was little scary at first but i felt a sense of being calm and nervous all at same time

content.detailedDescription: My sister-in-law called at 10:17 pm and said that my son (who was staying the night) had come running in the house saying "i just saw a ufo land on top a star!" typical type of thing you'd hear from a boy. anyhow, being the skeptical yet loving aunt she is, she went outside because he demanded everyone to look at what he was seeing. sure enough, she found what they saw odd enough to call and ask us if we could go out and take a look and see if we saw it too. we saw what she had described,but being the skeptics we are, we initially wrote it off as the "north star" simply because it was much larger than any other light in the sky (other than the moon) and it was bright white. but after observing for a minute, we realized that it not only emanated a glow around it like no other, but that it actually progressively was moving across the sky; not in such manner that you could see it abruptly move but that it changed position as we stood still over about a 10 minute timespan. the size remained constant for about the 10-15 minutes that my husband,our friend and i viewed it until it moved "away" from sight. i stayed on the phone with her as we continued to try and figure out what it was, but once it actually disappeared, we were completely convinced that this was nothing ordinary. it had a different kind of glow...A bit "hazier" and didn't "twinkle" like a star but did seem to have movement or character for lack of a better term. it was brite white and moved on to the wnw sky until it was just...Gone. anyhow, i've never seen anything like it. what the heck was this??!! look at the picture from the cell phone. the 2 red lights you see on the right side actually are the "bottom" of the pic; that was just some glare from something below...Not part of what was in the sky. but what the heck is that white light?
content.summary: Bright white light. watched it disappear. this was no star.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to have a smoke and as soon as i sat down a large green fireball streaked through the sky from the west torwards the north. at first i assumed it was a meteor or small asteroid but there are currently multiple police helicopters and military aircraft storming the area as i type this. they are approx. 8-10 mi. north of my location. if anyone else seen this and happen to have an allsky camera, please post the video. going back outside to see if anything else happens.
content.summary: Good sized fireball

content.detailedDescription:
Over the past several nights my wife and i have seen multiple lights over our house in the 10 pm to 11 pm time frame. the two that stand out are on saturday night 5/29 around 10:30 pm two bright lights moving from the south to north looking very high and fast where flying exactly parallel but with a large gap between them. they where flying the same speed and in unison for about a minute and then the left hand light made an immediate 60 to 75 degree turn while the other light continued on the straight course it was on. both faded from site in less than a minute.
 
the second event happened on tuesday 6/1 at 10:38 pm a similar light as described above was flying over my house heading nnw. i know the time and direction because i had my phone for the time and digital compass. it passed over the valley in about a minute and was past my house when there was a bright flash and it disappeared. on both nights all the objects looked the same and appeared to be very high with similar speed and no noise.

1. in both cases we where at our house in our pool.

2. being on a landing path for greater pittsburgh and allegheny county airports and having many fly over routes over my house i notice planes and have seen numerous objects fling over this area so we watch the sky at night when outside.

3. no opinion of object simular to seeing space station but not the same. does not give the impression of a plane of any kind i have seen.

4. desribed above.

5. seeing the object we where curious and and more so after seeing it's behavior.

6. desribed above
content.summary: Light flying over my house going nnw for about  a minute after passing over head bright flash of light and it is gone.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a spiral in the sky @ 5.50am 5 june 2010 brisbane. it was about the size of an orange and had a bright light at the centre and a spiral but it wasn���t spinning. it travelled across the sky﻿ and disappeared over the horizon after 2 min. 

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
we where in munna street wilston brisbane facing south about to head of for a bike ride. 

2. what made you first notice the object?
looking ahead you couldnt miss it. it was huge.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
i have never seen anything like it before, it was mesmerizing, so much so i didnt even think to video it on my phone.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions.
it had a very bright light in the centre and 5/6 clockwise spirals which travelled about 270 degrees around the center and faded off.

the spiral travelled from ssw 210, over our heads to﻿ 90 west and disappeared over the horizon.

the spiral did not rotate but moved across the sky at speeds slightly slower than an aircraft.

as it approached the horizon in the west the shape changed as if we where looking at a spiral from behind, the spiral was more cone like in appearence.

it looked similar to the one in norway but the spirals did not rotate around and around the center like that one.

the morning sky was still black and crystal clear. the moon was visable with no halo around it. stars could also be seen.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
just felt as if it was the coolest thing i had ever seen. and a bit of wtf!

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
it disappeared over the horizon.

sorry images are average taken from a mobile phone, #1 is the original and #2 i tried to lighten.
content.summary: Spiral ufo over brisbane australia

content.detailedDescription:
I should start with some info about me. i am a licensed commercial pilot and very familiar with aviation in general. 

on the day in question i was seated on a bench at the mini-golf place on 68th street in ocean city. since i was not actually playing i was looking around when i saw what i can only describe as a short vertical cylinder, dark and from time to time slightly shiny. it appeared to be a good distance from me but i could not make out its size. the object was behind a light pole on location which i used to reference its movements. 

the objects movements were so radical that as a pilot i can say it was not a plane. it was way too stationary for that. it was not a helicopter as it moved much to fast and with attitude changes that would not fit a rotor-craft flight characteristics at all. the objects movements were similar to some insects and humming birds as far as its super fast changes of direction. i wanted to make sure it was not an object attached to some form of line and just "flopping" in the wind. i ruled this out as it was not reproducing the same movements over time as such an object normally does in my experience. 

thanks to the light pole, i could have judged the speed of the object but since i could not tell how far away it was, i could not triangulate this correctly. if it was just on the other side of the pole it would have moved about 15 - 20 feet in maybe 1/10 of a second, it is was 100 away... well you get the point, i really could not say.

i was able to observe this object stay roughly in the same area for about 12 minutes when it just vanished. it did not fly away, it just totally disappeared.
content.summary: Small object with super erratic flight characteristics

content.detailedDescription: While watching tv i saw a light coming from far off at first i thought it was helicopter. as it got closer the object went from white light to off green glow then dark with frontal glow. i got off the couch to go outside thinking it was helicopter to hear the sound. there was no sound it flew in straight line coming at me while looking at it in the alley, no side to side movement just straight and silent. this is 2nd time in 3 years this has occurred. this object was about 4-5 hundred feet wide and about in center 150ft. thick nose to tail it was so low i could have thrown a rock and hit it. i'am deeply concerned about this.There were planes coming and going to the south out of allentown airport and not one changed course as this object continued right under them. this is no joke i am serious.My dog didn't even bark at it he went back to the door scared. i have tried to contact people about this and have had no luck in doing so. i could see the frontal 4 windows and the full bottom of this greyish craft flying over perfectly and immediately sketched the craft on paper. this is the second time in 3 years on a cloudless night. i don't know what it was but it wasn't military. sincerely [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Flew north to south at approximately 100 feet off ground silent and huge.

content.detailedDescription: I had taken my dogs for a run early in the morning - about 2:30 on may 14th 2010.  i was southeast of lodi on live oak road where the road to the winery intersects.  there are outside lights and i saw something crouched in the road which i thought at first was a coyote eating something.  then it stood up and was about 4 1/2 feet tall so i knew it wasn't a coyote.  it stooped back down and appeared to gather up whatever it had been eating; gave a little hop and soared away over the grapevines in an up down, up down motion.  the wings sort of glistened in the light and did not seem to have feathers.  i thought it looked like a gigantic bat, but have never heard of a bat that big.  the dogs seemed to be frightened and jumped into the car.  i was so amazed at what i saw.
content.summary: Saw larege bat-like figure which flew away after a  couple minutes

content.detailedDescription:
On the top of a hill, we saw two very bright white cylindrical ufos flying in perfect tandem at an amazing speed.

and we are trying to contact them again the 6 june 2010 at 21h00 pm.

http://www.Antollma.Org/mintervention/jeromedauphin.Php
content.summary: Two cylindrical ufos flying in perfect tandem

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on a porch looking south and noticed an object flying above and close to a commercial jet airplane heading northeast.  this immediately drew my attention.  i am a private pilot and never have seen anything fly so close to a commercial plane.   i thought it might be a military aircraft, but it was disc shaped and left no contrail like the commercial jet.  the sky was mostly sunny with a few high clouds and the commercial jet contrail was very visible.  

i stood up to get a closer view and called over two of my relatives also on the porch to look.  they both saw the object.   we watched the object hover above the airplane, then ascend at about a 70 degree angle out of view. 

after we all drew pictures of what we saw and talked about it to the relatives that weren't on the porch (each taking a turn to describe it).  the consensus was that the object was a disc and very shiny either white or metallic (the white plane looked dull in comparison); the disc flew tipped slightly on one end; the disc maintained a consistent speed and altitude above the airliner for at least 20 seconds; the disc then ascended at about a 70 degree incline and appeared to rise faster than the speed it traveled over the airliner; the disc didn't leave a contrail either over the airliner or when it accelerated as it was rising. 

we tried to think of all explanations for what the object could have been:  a weather balloon, a military jet, etc. and could find nothing that fits.
content.summary: Disc hovering over commercial jet, then flew up

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from mulberry and lemay in fort collins to the waterglen housing development off of i25.  the sky was very cloudy and i was looking in my rear view mirror at the clouds above the mountains behind me.  some of the clouds were dark and some were bright white.  when i turned left into neighborhood, i had a view of the western sky.  that is when i noticed 3 white objects in the sky.  they were closer than an airplane and well below the clouds.  then they seemed to flip end over end in formation and turn black with a bright white edge or outline.  they were distinctly separate but in near perfect formation.  my daughter said they were birds because of flight formation.  my son thought it was a military air show.  i was thinking what the heck is that.  maybe hang gliders?  but they were moving from south to north across the western sky at the same altitude and not getting lower.  they seemed to be flipping end over end changing from bright reflective white against the dark clouds to the outlined black.  the shape of each individual object was kind of boomerang but they were all 3 together in the shape of a triangle.  they moved rather slowly and we watched them until i pulled into my driveway.  the neighbor was walking out of his house, so i stopped him and asked "what the heck is that in the sky"  it took him about 10 seconds to locate what we were seeing.  he had no idea what it could be either.  we laughed about it being ufos.  we watched this for about 5 minutes until they disappeared behind the houses into the north western sky.  they never got closer or higher.  they just seemed to vanish.
immediately i went inside and posted this on my facebook page.  i wanted to document what i saw.  then i started to look on the internet for sightings in fort collins.  a couple of them matched my description, but on different dates.  i am left wondering "what the heck was that?"  maybe if i was another day, someone else will have reported it and i wont feel crazy anymore.
content.summary: 3 objects that changed from bright metallic white to black in formation

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking on a back road next too the qouset naval base and i look 
toward a abandon house off towards the naval base and saw a cylinder 
type ship with port windows across the cylinder and aliens were looking
out the port windows. i was amazed that this happen. i felt that i was seeing this. i said nobody would believe me. years went by but i keep this
 a secret too myself i thought that if i said anything to any one that
they would call me nuts. even now i think this could have been a weird
dream! i can't say i was real! i have no proof! but i if others are
willing to come forward guess it time for me also. i was 25yrs.Old when
i saw this craft! now i 59 years 0ld and married and have grand children.
maybe this was just time too say something,or maybe it just had too be
said like i said likely it was on my mind all these years but since
all this is being talk about i can say something. others things have
happen that i not able to talk about yet! but maybe if i hear about others
happening that are the same maybe i can come out say it to you.  one thing
for sure i read the bible and it says angels came too earth and mated
with our women and gave them childen !! who am i too say its a lie
when the word of god say so!
                      
                    thank you for reading this!

                        hope this help you on your quest for the truth!

                    p.S. please keep this private thak you.
content.summary: I saw the craft and the aliens take off !
